pr_title: Fix clearing specific items in clearinventory

timeline.message: Fix clearing specific items in clearinventory
Make sure mat/dat are added together
Clean up as per Ichbinjoe's suggestion

timeline.bodyText: I'd prefer this was replaced with a private enum, as done in #3191 - this variable only exists to control flow later on, and it's clearer if it uses a named enum constant than a magic number.
timeline.author: mdcfe
